name: A Journey in the Clouds
description:
Trough the six levels of this mini game the player is invited to pile cargo onto their hot air balloon. And make sure that the merchandise does not fall off because of the wind that blows.

Credits

Mylene Ben Osman

This game was created for the Game Design // UE course at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Game a Week"  (Winter Semester 2020/2021)
